pr_title: Use fine logging in w3c/b3 propagator instead of info.

timeline.message: Use fine logging in w3c propagator instead of info.

timeline.bodyText: This is mostly inconsistent, but we should probably use logger.info everywhere instead of logger.log(info,...)
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: This is a nit, so no need to really change here, but maybe good to have consistent.
replies.author: bogdandrutu
